title: The Unseen Shield: The Legend of Walter Taylor
summary: An 80-year-old advisor named Walter Taylor discovers he can shield his city from unseen threats. Over a week, he comes to terms with his powers and ultimately saves his community.
summaryGerman: Ein 80-jähriger Berater namens Walter Taylor entdeckt, dass er seine Stadt vor unsichtbaren Bedrohungen schützen kann. Innerhalb einer Woche akzeptiert er seine Kräfte und rettet letztendlich seine Gemeinde.
summaryDutch: Een 80-jarige adviseur genaamd Walter Taylor ontdekt dat hij zijn stad kan beschermen tegen onzichtbare bedreigingen. Gedurende een week accepteert hij zijn krachten en uiteindelijk redt hij zijn gemeenschap.
summaryFrench: Un conseiller de 80 ans nommé Walter Taylor découvre qu'il peut protéger sa ville contre les menaces invisibles. En une semaine, il accepte ses pouvoirs et finit par sauver sa communauté.

story.text: Walter discovers his ability to create invisible shields around things when he unknowingly stops a falling branch from hitting a passerby.
After testing his powers in various situations, Walter saves a child from a runaway bike, feeling both a sense of duty and concern over his newfound ability.
Walter confides in his longtime friend, Jane, who encourages him to use his powers for the greater good, fostering a sense of hope.
Local news starts reporting on a mysterious guardian angel. Walter feels proud but decides to remain anonymous.
Walter prevents a bank robbery by shielding the entrance until the police arrive. The event leaves him feeling triumphant.
Reflection and conversations with community members lead Walter to a deeper understanding of leadership.
During a city festival, Walter secretly averts a major disaster, securing his role as the city’s unseen protector.

ending: In the quietude of his own home, Walter decides that his guidance, even if unseen, is invaluable.
moral: True heroes are not always in the spotlight; sometimes, they are the unseen guardians whose impacts are felt rather than seen.
